txt.en: Faeron is stationed inside Barad Elenath, the Star-gazers' Spire.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron.
The merrevail have also brought their pets and plague-carriers, the great-bats, with them to Minas Morgul.
'With their plague-carriers defeated, they will be unable to deploy the plague on any Ranger encampments in the city. Thank you for your efforts, [placeholder].'
Great-bats from Agarnaith have invaded the third tier in Minas Morgul, the Circle of Madness.\n\nYou should defeat great-bats.

'The merrevail have not come alone; the great-bats have also joined in the invasion of the city. If I were to hazard a guess, Lhaereth plans to use them as plague-carriers to attack Gothmog's living forces in the heights of the city. We know first-hand how dangerous they are. They must be eliminated.'
